prompt.description:
Which XBlock from the list on the previous page do you think will be the most useful to you, and why?

Don't forget to refresh once you're done to give yourself a grade!

criterion.label: Quality of Answer
criterion.prompt: How good you think the answer was.

option.label: Poor
option.explanation: You just mashed a bunch of keys so that you could move on. It's OK, we know you're busy. But you get no points.

option.label: Fair
option.explanation: Not bad. Could've been better though.

option.label: Excellent
option.explanation: The best answer you could've given. Great work... unless you're just giving yourself this grade for your own ego. But who would do that?

rubric.feedbackprompt: (Optional) What aspects of this response stood out to you? What did it do well? How could it be improved?
